June 13, 1912 D Towyn Contest
Towyn Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
towyn-contest
None
For King and Country
Towyn March contest 1st Dolgelly, 2nd Towyn, 3rd Aberllefenni. Result as shown in British Bandsman., result in Brass Band News July 1912 given as - 1st Dolgelly, 2nd Aberllefeni, 3rd Towyn.(i.e. the same as the draw !).
Sept. 29, 2012, 10:59 a.m. Sept. 27, 2018, 9 p.m.
1 Towyn Silver Band R. O. Jones
2 Dolgelly John Williams
3 Aberllefenni B. H. Jones
